DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. reduce rare card chance by #b75%.

riskOfRelics:Ego.NAME: Egocentrism
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, deal #b10 damage to a random enemy a number of times equal to this relic's counter. NL at the end of the battle, a random relic is destroyed and added to the counter.
